value:
With everyone distracted by the
festival, treasures in the castle areâ€”
Ahahaha! That was a joke. Just a joke!

The rich hoard money by bullying the
weak. I steal from the rich, and give it
back to those who deserve it!

A new outfit for the festival! Hehe,
this is perfect for the occasion, don't
you think?

There are people in this world who
can't live unsullied lives. Master
thieves are here to help those people.

What's this? A festival just for us
thieves?! This is my time to shine!
Cath's Bandits, assemble!

Security seems a little light in this
castle. Don't worry, your friend's
castle had the same problem.

The shiny coins and sparkling jewelry!
It's all calling out to me!

You did leave yourself wide open.
Good learning experience though!

No way! I can't believe you sensed
my presence!

This is what they call a "lavish feast,"
right? I'm gonna try everything!

I've come a looong waaay for this
event! It's really happening! I'll be the
star of the festival!

The Kingdom of Askr is throwing a
festival, just for me! Nice!$k$pIt's not that kind of festival? How can
you say that? When someone says
"master thief," you think of me, right?$k$pTherefore, it isn't an exaggeration to
say that this festival is the ultimate
celebration of me!$k$pOh! You know what else? This is the
perfect place to scout for more
recruits for Cath's Bandits.$k$pI met a pair earlier with a mysterious
air about them. And that masked lady
thief seemed to be quite skilled.$k$pSo many great additions to the roster!
Cath's Bandits have a bright future!
Shut your trap.
I'll take that!
I can steal anything!
You're no match for me!
Are you kidding me?
What? You don't know who I am? I'm Cath! The master thief!
*squeal* Calm down, Cath! There's nothing to be scared of. You're a thief, after all!
I'm an optimist. No time for doom and gloom!
It's no fun if you can just walk in and take things. Where's the thrill?
I just wish I could hand out all this wealth back home...
Psst. Just between us...where does the royal family hide its treasure?
Y'know, you're not so bad. I mean, you're nowhere near as good as me, but...who is?
Fine, I'll take care of it.
Oh. What? Um...
Gimme treasure!
